scenario.name: https://github.com/willyrgf/test-sip-calls
scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[$to]@[$gateway] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port] From: sipp <sip:[$from]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: [$to] <sip:[$to]@[$gateway]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] Cseq: 1 INVITE Contact: sip:[$from]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=u1 1441277065 1441277066 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=- c=IN IP[media_ip_type] [media_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [media_port] RTP/AVP 18 101 13 a=rtpmap:18 G729/8000 a=fmtp:18 annexb=no a=rtpmap:101 telephone-event/8000 a=fmtp:101 0-16 a=ptime:20 a=sendrecv

ACK [next_url] SIP/2.0 [routes] Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:[$from]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: [$to] <[next_url]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 ACK Contact: sip:[$from]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0

BYE [next_url] SIP/2.0 [routes] Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: sipp <sip:[$from]@[local_ip]:[local_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: [$to] <[next_url]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 BYE Contact: sip:[$from]@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 70 Subject: Performance Test Content-Length: 0
